segments.text: That's brilliant ! We can name the grades of motor oil by where they come from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Mechanic , I'd like a nice Venezuelan blend this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the Saudi Arabian will hit the spot today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But really , maybe this can work . Everyone loves coffee , and everyone needs motor oil .
segments.speaker: S2
